Each set of 12 clues matches to exactly one of the 11 grids. Letters in any given box will be identical, whatever its height.
As the flavortext says, make sure to stack up ALL of the inventory.
Note that one of the grids starts with the word TOPMOST, and that the last word in another grid is BOTTOM.
In order to properly stack the grids, you'll need some more words, all of which share a particular category.
By adding a human bone between grids (each missing a letter; they're broken), you can stack all of the grids on top of each other. Keep track of those missing letters.
